import{w3cwebsocket as W3CWebSocket}from"websocket";var socket=new W3CWebSocket((window.location.protocol==="https:"?"wss://":"ws://")+window.location.host+"/ws");var x=false;function waitForCalback(){if(x){console.log("DONE");return;}else{console.log("WAITIG");setTimeout(waitForCalback,5);}}socket.onopen=function(){console.log('WebSocket Client Connected');x=true;};waitForCalback();// socket.send('Hello')
export default socket;
